nodes.text: The Salvage Bandit Camp was a base of operations of the Mustafarian Salvage bandits in the south-eastern part of the Crystal Flats on the planet Mustafar.
In 1 ABY a spacer found old recordings of a Jedi Knight in this camp.

The Salvage Bandit Camp appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
